summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Wide Band Bonnet Night Sleep Cap Sleeping Head Cover for Women Girls (Black Floral+Light Pink Floral,2 Pieces) Review Date: 2019/06/10 Store: MISSGGBOND Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9.6 x 6.7 x 0.32 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '654070359935'} Review Text: Nice and comfortable but there hasn't been a single night I've woken up with it still covering my hair which is its sole purpose Review Title: Nice but... Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 13X4 Lace Front Wigs 100% Human Hair Wig with Baby Hair 14 Inches Natural Black Straight Wig 130% Density Review Date: 2019/07/11 Store: Angie Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 3.8 x 1.5 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '656699784860'} Review Text: At first I was a little wary buying a wig on Amazon but boyyyyy let me tell you this wig is seen together so well! Tracks are smooth, few random streaks and strands typical from decent bundle hair so I im waiting to color it jet black. No shedding no scent and the hair is soft out the packaging. *will update with pics after install*
*update* super thin on your head. Feels like 2 bundles or less. Hairline is awkward and looks wigish Review Title: Yessss Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 22inch Canvas Block Head Mannequin with Stand Manikin Head Set for Wig Making Display Styling with Mount Hole Rose red Review Date: 2019/07/29 Store: LANQI Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '12.87 x 8.31 x 7.44 inches; 1.52 Pounds', 'UPC': '681413486515'} Review Text: Not every stand comes in multiple sizes but I was able to get my correct size here making this perfect. Leta talk about the gifts! Literally everything you need to make a decent wig, pins needle thread. It even comes with an amazing wig cap. The stand is sturdy, I was able to pin a wig on and de tangle without it slipping off or having to fight the stand from shifting. All in all I love this block head, cant wait to use her to slay some wigs Review Title: Perfect Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Headbands for Women - WEKEY Knot Headband for Girls, Vintage Pearl Headband with Faux Pearls, Elastic Wide Knotted Hair Bands - 3 Pack Review Date: 2019/08/14 Store: WEKEY Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Color': 'Blue,Navy,Beige,Pink', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 7.8 x 1.65 inches; 5.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '825687899477'} Review Text: Came a little curved from shipping but once you put it on its fine. Ends don't dig into your head. Pulls smoothly through hair. Review Title: Cute Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes with Magnetic Eyeliner - Magnetic Eyeliner and Eyelashes No Glue Silk Magnetic Lashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Natural Look Reusable Eyelashes Eye Liner (Diamond ZG-2) Review Date: 2019/09/17 Store: soyond Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 4.5 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: Literally one of the magnets stuck to the plastic when I took it out the case so the lash lifts off my eyelid. Was really hoping this worked like the reviews said Review Title: Disappointed Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The purchase history reveals a preference for beauty and hair accessories, with a particular focus on comfort, functionality, and aesthetic appeal. Ratings indicate a mixed response—while quality is often prioritized, effectiveness varies significantly among products. The individual appreciates items that enhance beauty routines, such as wigs and hair accessories, yet shows frustration with products not fulfilling their intended purpose, as seen in the review of magnetic eyelashes.

Common themes center around hair care and styling, with a specific interest in products like sleep caps for maintaining hairstyles overnight, wigs for versatility, and headbands for aesthetics. Quality is important, evidenced by high ratings for well-constructed items and lower ratings for those that fail in performance, indicating a low tolerance for disappointment.

Price sensitivity is not explicitly clear but appears to favor products offering good value with functional and aesthetic benefits. The tendency to gravitate towards higher-rated products suggests a preference for established quality over bargain options. Overall, this shopper’s core preferences reflect a balance between style and practicality, with a strong emphasis on reliable performance in beauty-related purchases.

target_interaction.title: Hot
target_interaction.text: Tried to make it work but if it managed to stay on my head all night I wake up hot with sweaty edges. Adjustable band likes to disappear into the cap. The band also likes to come apart when it feels like.
target_interaction.title_meta: 2 Pieces Satin Lined Sleep Caps Hair Cover Bonnets Silk Lined Slouchy Beanies Sleeping Caps for Night Sleeping (Black, Purple,25 cm)
